channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta’s New Vanguard Smart Glasses Have More Advanced Features Than Its Ray-Ban Specs
item.description: The range of smart glasses now has a new model, Oakley Meta Vanguard, performance AI glasses designed for high-intensity sports.

item.title: What Block’s CFO and finance team want peers to know about Bitcoin
item.description: Block, Inc. made its first corporate bitcoin purchase in 2020.

item.title: Is Your Work Password On This Website? If So, Change It Now
item.description: You have been warned — change all these passwords now, before it's too late.

item.title: Freepik’s Spaces Makes AI A Team Sport For Creators
item.description: Freepik’s announces a new Spaces offering, a shared workflow board where creatives can wire together image and video outputs in a node style interface...

item.title: IBM’s CEO disagrees with JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon’s disdain for texting in meetings: ‘Telling people they can’t use their technology would be weird’

item.title: New York’s mayoral race becomes a national test of economic populism as Mamdani challenges Cuomo’s comeback
item.description: New York City's voters are deciding the outcome of a generational and ideological divide that will resonate across the country.

item.title: Coca-Cola’s Latest Ads Fail To Make the Case For Using AI
item.description: Coca-Cola's new AI powered ads don't seem to be saving the company time or money, or making any real difference at all. And they're not alone.

item.title: Dictionary.com risks Gen Z mockery by crowning ‘6-7’ as word of the year
item.description: “Don’t worry, because we’re all still trying to figure out exactly what it means," the site said in its unusual announcement that lacked a definition.

item.title: Wall Street sinks under the weight of its own expectations as Big Tech’s AI high fades and Fed doubts creep in
item.description: AI darlings Palantir, Nvidia, and Tesla slide, sinking the S&P and the Dow in the early going Tuesday.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
